CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1946, pg. 9, reads: "Throngs Expected at Beauty Shop Owners' Revue - Last Call for Glamour!  April 9 is the date set for the annual Beauty Shop Owners' Association fashion revue at Schenley High School and all the lovely ladies and kiddies above will appear in the the show which promises to be the best yet... Lower left: Junior Misses Nancy Reed, Dolores Dolan, Elizabeth Christin, Joan Batch and Betty Shadd will model... - All Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Six women, including Nancy Reed, Dolores Dolan, Elizabeth Christin, Joan Batch, and Betty Shadd seated on steps of Wesley Center AME Zion Church, Centre Avenue, Hill District
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Hats--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Buildings--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Church buildings--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Wesley Center African Methodist Episcopal Zion Church (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
